DOC.brief_summary: This open-label pilot , feasibility/exploratory study evaluate safety laser interstitial thermal therapy ( LITT ) use Visualase focal ablation prostate tissue gather data design future study . Intra-procedure temperature concurrent rectal wall thermistor monitoring perform internal validation . Subjects monitor adverse event , health-related quality life ( HRQOL ) questionnaire obtain . Post-treatment MRI biopsy obtain evaluate histologic radiologic change . Biomarker ( PSA , PCA3 PHI ) kinetics also monitor .
